api_list.name: Stocks
api_list.description: Retrieves market data for any Brazilian stock.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fundamentus.p.rapidapi.com/stock/{ticker}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fundamentus.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
